title: Madeline and the forty thieves. Madeline and the dog show
brief_description: More adventures of little Madeline, narrated by Christopher Plummer and based on the beloved books by Ludwig Bemelmans. “Madeline and the forty thieves”: At the old house - and all over the neighbourhood - hats, gloves and scarves are missing. Madeline and Pepito investigate with Detective Moreau and uncover some very unusual thieves. “Madeline and the dog show”: Even though she out-performs the competition, Genevieve is disqualified from a dog show because she is not pure bred but the judges change their tune when she rescues the Mayor’s dog.
